trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The chipper pixie looks at you playfully.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the chipper pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_TODO_01<tab>Use the spyglass to count the number of pixies.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_TODO_02<tab>Report to the chipper pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the chipper pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_000<tab>Oh, to have so many mortals visiting us... I can scarcely contain my excitement!
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_001<tab>I know a really fun game! Come with me, and we'll have oodles of fun together!
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_010<tab>There you are! Here, I will lend you this tube.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_011<tab>A spyglass, I believe you mortals call it, and it makes small things look big. We're going to use it for our game.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_012<tab>The rules are simple: stand over there, look through the spyglass, and count the pixies. If you get our number right, I'll give you a fabulous prize!
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>Inspect the designated location to look through the spyglass and begin counting pixies.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_SYSTEM_110_020<tab>You will have thirty seconds to complete the task, after which you may give your answer to the chipper pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_013<tab>Stand over there, look through the spyglass, and count the pixies. There's nothing to it!
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_020<tab>Done counting, are you? So, how many of us are there?
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_Q1_000_000<tab>How many pixies are there?
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_A1_000_001<tab>One.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_A1_000_002<tab>Three.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_A1_000_003<tab>Four.
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_021<tab>Are you sure? Really, truly, <var 1A 02 /var>absolutely<var 1A 01 /var> sure? Because if you aren't, you should check again!
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_022<tab>Correct, there are four of us! Well done, mortal! Here's the fabulous prize I─ ...Oh, fiddlesticks, I left it back at Lydha Lran!
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_023<tab>Well, we'll just have to make a game of it. Last one back to the village is a rotten egg!
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_030<tab>Tee hee, beat you back! I get to turn you into a rotten egg!
TEXT_LUCKZC019_03402_PIXIE03402_000_031<tab>...Oh, I jest, I jest! I won't turn you into a rotten egg─not so soon after you played with me, at any rate. Here's your prize. Let's play again soon!
